snippet.title: FINAL FANTASY PIXEL REMASTER | E3 Teaser Trailer (PEGI)
snippet.description:
The games that inspired a generation come to life once more, in the ultimate 2D pixel remaster. 

Coming soon to Steam and Mobile!
